column11: x, Their origins can be traced in Russian folklore, history, literature and legends. Those parts of ancient and often distorted lore formed the new core of this faith.

x, Their origins can be traced in Russian folklore, history, literature and legends. Those parts of ancient and often distorted lore formed the new core of this faith. Folklorist faith has now been codified in order to withstand attacks from neighboring religions.

column2: A belief system with roots stretching back shortly after the Event,Folklorism draws from folklore, ancient myth, and the popular culture of Great Russia. They worship a diverse pantheon of deities,which are believed to possess magnificent powers which they sometimes grant to mortal followers in exchange for worship. The most powerful deity is the mighty Mother Russia,patron goddess of Great Russia and conqueror of all between the White and Black Seas.

A belief system with roots stretching back shortly after the Event,Folklorism draws from folklore, ancient myth, and the popular culture of Great Russia. The religion has been reformed and restructured,given a proper basis on which to base itself so that it may resist the advances of Crown and Cross.

Originating from a pre-Event split within the Russian Orthodox Church, the reasons for the Old Belivers' existence is lost in the mists of time. They maintain that the Russian Church, under the influence of the demon Nikon, tried to pervert and destroy Christ's Church, creating the Zarist faith. However, their ancestors escaped into the wild, where they hid until eventually the wrath of God destroyed the apostate Russia, no longer deserving the title of 'Holy'. In-game, the Old Believers are extremely resilient to outside influences both military and proselytic.
§Y*§!Old Believer counties house larger Garrisons and receive combat bonuses in their own terrain.,,,,,,,,
